events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund because this is not what I ordered.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to an incorrect product delivery.
Support agent Jane Doe has been assigned to handle this refund case.
Hello! I’m Jane from customer support. I’m here to help you process your refund for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. Attached is a photo showing the item I received which is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method and send instructions on how to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help resolving this matter.
The refund has been processed and you will receive confirmation shortly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We wanted to check in and make sure you received your refund and that everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
